feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas appropriately to separate clauses and phrases.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display a similar level of formality and word choice.

feature3.explanation: Both texts are concise and straightforward with no complex sentence structures.

feature4.explanation: Both texts exhibit a neutral and informative tone without distinct narrative styles.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation, formality, conciseness, tone, and absence of errors, the likelihood of the same authorship is moderate.
